CHECK THE OTHER BST CATEGORIES FOR OTHER 40% OFF OFFERINGS

I would really like to move these guys so I'm offering them at a serious discount.

Scans for most cards can be found here:
[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/album.php?albumid=1134[/url]

If you see anything in the scans that isn't listed below, please inquire as I will offer discounts on those as well (but not 40%).

These prices are now firm, although I would consider offers on the entire group.

Safe, basic shipping is included; if you want something more elaborate or fast like priority mail, please plan to kick in a few extra bucks.

T205 Bresnahan Cardinals VG HOF  $54  SOLD
T205 Griffith Reds F-G HOF  $33  SOLD
T205 Latham Giants VG-EX  $45  SOLD
